titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: MULTI-PROFESSIONAL OR MULTI-DISCIPLINARY INDICATION CODE - Description

div.p: An indication of whether a PATIENT was seen by a single or multiple CARE PROFESSIONALS during an Clinic Attendance Consultant or Clinic Attendance Non-Consultant, recorded for the purposes of the National Tariff Payment System.

p.b: This data item is included in Commissioning Data Set version 6-2, but should not be submitted until further development by the Department of Health has been undertaken.
